statements: SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE client_id = 1234;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientPortfolioInformation ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM ClientPortfolioInformation ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE client_name='John Smith'
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT client_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM ClientPortfolioInformation WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_clients FROM ClientPortfolioInformation
SELECT client_name, SUM(investment_amount) as total_investment FROM ClientPortfolioInformation GROUP BY client_name
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM clients WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_type FROM clients WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, performance_rating FROM clients JOIN performance_reports ON clients.client_id = performance_reports.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM clients WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_amount, investment_type FROM clients WHERE investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT c.client_name, p.report_date, p.performance_rating FROM clients c INNER JOIN performance_reports p ON c.client_id = p.client_id WHERE p.performance_rating > 8 ORDER BY p.performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Client_Portfolios;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_amount FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM Performance_Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_email FROM Analysts;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Bonds' AND investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT analyst_id, analyst_name, analyst_email FROM Analysts ORDER BY analyst_name ASC
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Bonds' AND investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, investment_amount, investment_type FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' AND investment_type IN ('Stocks', 'Bonds')

SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, investment_amount, performance_score FROM Client_Portfolios JOIN Performance_Reports ON Client_Portfolios.client_id = Performance_Reports.client_id ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT * FROM Client;
SELECT name, email FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM Investment ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT client_id, email FROM Client WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT portfolio_id, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Client;
SELECT name, email FROM Client WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT portfolio_id, date_created, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 1000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity, purchase_price FROM Investment WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;

SELECT pr.report_id, pr.report_date, pr.performance, p.client_id, p.date_created FROM PerformanceReport pr JOIN Portfolio p ON pr.portfolio_id = p.portfolio_id WHERE pr.performance > 5 ORDER BY p.date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 100000;
SELECT security_name, price FROM securities ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT client_id, report_date, performance_metric FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_metric < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT client_name, transaction_type, amount FROM client_portfolios JOIN transactions ON client_portfolios.client_id = transactions.client_id;
SELECT DISTINCT security_type FROM securities;

SELECT client_name, report_date, performance_metric FROM client_portfolios JOIN performance_reports ON client_portfolios.client_id = performance_reports.client_id WHERE performance_metric > 0 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
